# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE! THIS FILE IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED BY xml2cmake
PROJECT(Vis5D_database)

ADD_DATABASE_CODE_GEN_TARGETS(Vis5D)

SET(COMMON_SOURCES
Vis5DPluginInfo.C
Vis5DCommonPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBI_SOURCES
Vis5DPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBM_SOURCES
Vis5DMDServerPluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtVis5DFileFormat.C
v5d.C
binio.C
)

SET(LIBE_SOURCES
Vis5DEnginePluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtVis5DFileFormat.C
v5d.C
binio.C
)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
${VISIT_DATABASE_INCLUDES}
)

LINK_DIRECTORIES(${VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR} )

ADD_LIBRARY(IVis5DDatabase ${LIBI_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(IVis5DDatabase visitcommon)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS IVis5DDatabase)

IF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)
    ADD_LIBRARY(MVis5DDatabase ${LIBM_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(MVis5DDatabase visitcommon avtdbatts avtdatabase_ser )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(MVis5DDatabase MDSERVER)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} MVis5DDatabase)
ENDIF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)

ADD_LIBRARY(EVis5DDatabase_ser ${LIBE_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EVis5DDatabase_ser visitcommon avtpipeline_ser avtdatabase_ser )
ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EVis5DDatabase_ser ENGINE)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EVis5DDatabase_ser)

IF(VISIT_PARALLEL)
    ADD_PARALLEL_LIBRARY(EVis5DDatabase_par ${LIBE_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EVis5DDatabase_par visitcommon avtpipeline_par avtdatabase_par )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EVis5DDatabase_par ENGINE)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EVis5DDatabase_par)
ENDIF(VISIT_PARALLEL)

VISIT_INSTALL_DATABASE_PLUGINS(${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_RTOD(databases ${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_FOLDER(databases Vis5D ${INSTALLTARGETS})
